features: ✅ ANY-POSITION TILT LOCK DESK CHAIR: 90-130 degree synchro reclining at ANY POSITION locking tilting, adjustment system (chair height, lumbar support, 3D armrests and headrest). Our ergonomic desk chair with wheels focus on every details to fit your personal needs, whether you are working, studying or resting. The high back office chair provides a long hours comfortable

✅ ERGONOMIC OFFICE GAMING CHAIR: Compared with other swivel office chairs' plastic 1D armrest, our 3D armrests with bigger, thicker & softer PU padding are the best to fit your various seating position. Big and tall office chair equipped with breathable mesh back and adjustable lumbar support, giving you a full back support, relieving your low back pain and keeping you cool

✅ LARGE ADJUSTABLE HEADREST: Mesh office chair with headrest which is bigger than other task desk chairs, it can be adjusted up and down for head and neck support. The shape of the padded headrest is rectangular to accommodate your head well. Thanks to soft memery foam wide seat cushion, our ergonomic chair can relieve the pressure on your thighs

✅ DURABLE COMPUTER DESK CHAIR: Weight capacity 330lbs home office chair with wide seat is ideal for adults comfy. 5 star heavy duty matal office chair base with 360° swivel mute casters go smoothly on any floor or carpet. With a modern compact looking and useful features, the ergonomic office chair goes well in office, gaming, and home

✅ EASY ASSEMBLE OFFICE CHAIRS CLEARANCE: With clear instruction, our supportive office chair for desk can be easily assembled with a single tool in 10 minites. BIFMA certified sturdy work chair meets the requirements for durability and stability. Best customer service is provided to our highly rated rolling computer chair, feel free to contact us if you meet any problems

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This mesh ergonomic office chair has all the adjustments you need in a home office chair, including tilting tension, tilt locking, seat height, and 3D armrest, comfortable seat and adjustable lumbar support. It is comfortable for all day sitting.
Our office chairs have 90-130° tilt design, lock at ANY ANGLE (Others just 1-3 locking angle), allow you to tilt freely from work to ease.

You do need a big headrest. When you are tired from work, it can fully support your head and give you a rest. There is no doubt that our TfficeTingco big and tall office chair with large headrest is a good choice for home office.

ANY POSITION TILT LOCK This computer desk chair has a 90-130° adjustable synchro recline. Unique design, more than 3 position lock, you can lock in any position, find your most comfortable position. METAL FIVE STARS BASE The updated iron five-star chair base is stronger than nylon and has a higher capacity of 2650lbs. The matte lacquer surface makes the entire office chair more coordinated and beautiful. ADJUSTABLE LUMBAR SUPPORT Convex-shaped back with adjustable lumbar support ensures proper spine alignment and offers comfort. Whether in the office or at home, our ergonomic desk chairs can be your good partner.

GAMING Perfect as gaming chair, pillow like headrest offers sufficent head and shoulder support. HOME WORKING Accompany home working, creates a comfortable working spot, gives familiar environment as in the office. OFFICE WORKING Ergonomic for office, supports sitting for 8 hours, allows focus on working without notice back or neck pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I personally love this chair – so far at least! It was easy to put together, seems really sturdy (especially given the price), and is comfortable. I work from home so having a good chair to sit on for 7+ hours a day is very important. This chair lived up to that need and seems to be a really good purchase. I do love that the chair is firm, but not too hard and the back is mesh so you don’t get too hot. It does also have a head rest, and leans back for added comfort. The arm rests to move so you can adjust as needed, and you can also higher or lower the chair. Overall, I would recommend this to someone looking for a good chair at a good price. If you are using it on carpet – I do recommend a mat as it is hard to move on carpet but you would have that with any chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Actually very surprised by how high quality this chair is! I was in desperate need of a new office chair as my previous didn’t provide sufficient back support. I work from home most days and my old chair was really started taking a toll on my back. I searched high and low for a solid office chair that wouldn’t break the bank. I decided on this one based on all the great reviews and I’m so glad I did! This chair is solid, breathable, provides wonderful lumbar support, and you can adjust many parts of the chair to meet your exact needs. Good posture is much easier to maintain in this chair! I put this together on my own, it took me around 20 minutes. Not tough at all, the directions were easy to understand. Very happy with this purchase!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ergonomic Office Chair Review: Comfortable, Breathable, and Adjustable, Perfect for Desk work
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this ergonomic office chair with mesh and lumbar support for a few months now, and I'm absolutely loving it. It's so comfortable and supportive, and it's made a huge difference in my back pain.The mesh back is really breathable, so I don't get hot and sweaty when I'm sitting in it for long periods of time. The lumbar support is also adjustable, so I can find the perfect position for my back.The chair is also very adjustable in general. I can adjust the height, seat depth, armrests, and tilt. This makes it perfect for people of all sizes.Overall, I'm really happy with this chair. It's comfortable, supportive, and adjustable. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an ergonomic office chair.Here are some of the pros and cons of this chair:Pros:Comfortable and supportiveBreathable mesh backAdjustable lumbar supportAdjustable height, seat depth, armrests, and tiltDurable constructionCons:Some assembly requiredNot as stylish as some other office chairsOverall, I think this is a great office chair for the price. It's comfortable, supportive, and adjustable, and it's made of durable materials. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable and ergonomic office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good chair need a few upgrades
reviews.reviewText: Chair is very nice, feels good and easy to install. I wish the attaching the arms was by a single screw with a knob and easy to adjust but instead are 3 bolts on each side. the other issue i didnt realize the back doesnt move back or forth to adjust the length for your legs and make the seat a little deeper. Other than that no complaints and easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable office chair!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great chair, it is forcing me to sit correctly and is comfortable to sit in for long hours. Very sturdy yet lightweight. Love that the arms are adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best office chair I have ever had
reviews.reviewText: This chair is fantastic! Love the way it feels and the options you have for adjustment. Especially the tension knob. It works really well to tighten so you can just the right level of tension to you can lean back and the chair will hold you there and then come right back up when you back up straight. As soon as I put it together (which is so easy and only take 15 minutes) my wife came and tried it. 48 seconds later I am back on amazon buying the exact same chair for her now. The only thing I wish was that it came in a white or black/white option. *NOTE* when you get to the step to install the arms look on the bottom of the arm pieces between the screw holes and you will see the L and R so you dont put them on the wrong side and have to redo like did. Love it though, very happy with purchase, and will recommend to people for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price point and delivers on quality
reviews.reviewText: I spent a great deal of time researching chairs that were affordable but would also deliver on the quality I was looking for, especially with regard to lumbar support, as I sit at my desk for long hours during the day and have recurring low back pain. I recently got this chair and feel an immediate relief with the support it delivers to to the lower back. Everyone's back is different, but this chair contours to my back nicely and I love that the lumbar support is adjustable. Some of the chairs I was looking at had fixed lumbar support, which was a no-go for me personally.Additionally, the chair has other nice customizable features. I am around six feet tall and was able to lift the headrest up to good point so when I lean back my head hits it squarely. The tilt and lock features work smooth and easily as does the arm-rest maneuverability. Assembly was also pretty easy and clearly delineated in the instructions.Overall I am quite pleased and find that this chair delivers substantially on what was advertised, especially given the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable and Somewhat Easy To Build
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very comfortable and has lots of cool features that make it worth the price. The chair is high-quality and doesn't feel cheap at all there is one part that covers the intersection of the legs that is just a piece of cheapish plastic but the rest of the chair is either some sort of metal or high-quality plastic. While building, I found that it came with one extra of each type of fastener just in case you lost one. Also when connecting the arms to the seat part of the chair it will be hard without setting the seat upside down in a way that the arms can hang down to screw them in, the same thing when connecting the back of the chair to the seat part. I luckily had a stool to rest the seat down on to be able to put it together.
